item.title: Reconciling Innovation and Sustainability
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Conference by Collaboration Betters The World on reducing the environmental impact of your projects: what strategies can you use to reconcile innovation and sustainability? at the Swiss IT forum(s) 2024 held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)
